Text: I had put in the wrong driver before..this is the real thing. I'll be seeding till tomorrow

hello, does this package include ATI graphic drivers and intel programs too? can you tell me what this package includes alltogether?

This is exactly what I needed. It is one EXE file that contains all the drivers (video, sound, keyboard, iSight cam, mic, network, wireless, bluetooth, chipsets, etc.) for Windows XP.  I have a Macbook (not pro) and it works perfectly. Pair this with rEFIt and no need for BootCamp.

yeah!
this is what I was missing, I hope

I hope that this will install drivers for ethernet controller, the keyboard etc, etc...

... and it worked!
Now I can start working at home on the network application that only works on a PC
